moves.1... e5 2. Bg2 d6 3. Nc3 c6: He isn't as stupid as I had hoped.
moves.4. h3 h5: I don't think this is the best move.
moves.5. gxh5 Rxh5 6. e3: e4 just blocks in my lsb.
moves.10... Nf5 11. Qf3 Nxg3: ? This allows me to open the f-file.
moves.17. Nc3 Kc7: He gets of the dangerous diagonal.
moves.18. Nb5+ Kd7 19. Bg4+: Now I get the right idea.
moves.21. Rf7+ Ke6 22. Rxg7 gxh3: ? This might not be the best move.
moves.24... Be6 25. Bg5+: Now my bishop enters the fray.
moves.25... Kd7 26. Rg7+ Kc8 27. Rf1: The other rook comes. Maybe Rd1 instead?
moves.28. Re7: ? Best to keep the rooks on.
